channel.title: soul on no exceptions
channel.description: Recent content in soul on no exceptions

item.title: I am the best! - Ali
item.description: In a world defined by cut throat competition, with no one really looking out for you; How do you shine with the skills that you have? Here’s to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They’re not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them.

item.title: Si tú me olvidas
item.description: Si tú me olvidas (Spanish) Neruda, Pablo Quiero que sepas una cosa. Tú sabes cómo es esto: si miro la luna de cristal, la rama roja del lento otoño en mi ventana, si toco junto al fuego la impalpable ceniza o el arrugado cuerpo de la leña, todo me lleva a ti, como si todo lo que existe, aromas, luz, metales, fueran pequeños barcos que navegan hacia las islas tuyas que me aguardan.
